glsa.title: Nokogiri: Command injection
glsa.synopsis: Nokogiri has a vulnerability allowing arbitrary execution of code if a certain function is used.

background.p: Nokogiri is an HTML, XML, SAX, and Reader parser.

description.p: A command injection vulnerability in Nokogiri allows commands to be executed in a subprocess by Rubyâ€™s Kernel.open method. Processes are vulnerable only if the undocumented method Nokogiri::CSS::Tokenizer#load_file is being passed untrusted user input.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: Avoid calling the undocumented method Nokogiri::CSS::Tokenizer#load_file with untrusted user input.
